Package edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram

Provides classes and interfaces that represent a stochastic language model

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BackoffLanguageModel
    Represents the generic interface to an N-Gram language model that uses backoff to estimate unseen probabilities.
    LanguageModel
    Represents the generic interface to an N-Gram language model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InterpolatedLanguageModel
    Simple interpolated LM implementation.
    KeywordOptimizerModel  
    NetworkLanguageModel  
    ProbDepth
    Class for returning results from BackoffLanguageModel
    SimpleNGramModel
    An ASCII ARPA language model loader.
